title: The Symbolism and Spiritual Meanings Behind Dreams About Dogs

steps.title: Loyalty
steps.content: Loyalty Dogs are unwaveringly loyal and dedicated to their family and owner. They stick by their people through thick and thin and are always looking out for them. When you see a friendly dog in your dream, this might be a sign that you are surrounded by loving, supportive, and trustworthy people, whether they’re your partner, friends, family, or coworkers. [1] X Research source A dog dream can also reflect your loyalty to yourself and represent your perseverance and tenacity to succeed and achieve your dreams. The dog’s behavior can alter the dream’s meaning. If they are aggressive, it can mean that people around you are disloyal and might betray you. The culture you grew up in and how you feel about dogs can also impact the dream’s meaning. A dog might be a comforting reminder about your childhood pet, or leave you feeling scared or uneasy. Reader Poll: We asked 563 wikiHow readers if they believe that their dreams have meaning, and 64% said yes . [Take Poll] So if you feel that your dreams have special or spiritual meaning, most people agree with you!

steps.title: Companionship
steps.content: Companionship There’s a reason why dogs are considered man’s best friend—these sweet, furry pets form tight bonds with their people and are always close by their side with a happy, wagging tail. Dreaming about a dog can mean a new relationship is on the horizon for you, whether it’s romantic or platonic. [2] X Research source This dream can also reflect your love and affection for the people in your life. If the dog is unfriendly or aggressive, it might symbolize conflicts you’re having with people in your life that are making you feel angry or frustrated.

steps.title: Protection
steps.content: Protection A dog’s undying love and loyalty for the people in their lives means that they’re protective over them, too. Seeing one of these faithful guardians in your dreams can signify people in your life who make you feel safe and secure. Or, it can indicate your desire to seek out certainty in your life, like a fulfilling relationship or stable job. [3] X Research source Many people believe that their spirit guide takes the form of a dog. So, seeing a dog in your dream can indicate that your spirit guide is protecting you and guiding you towards your purpose. When a dog is aggressive in your dream, it can mean that your safety is being threatened, whether that’s from a jealous friend or instability in the workplace. The type of dog and their qualities can influence your dream, too. For example, a German Shepherd can indicate your desire to protect and guard your friends, while a Yorkshire Terrier might be a sign to tap into your playful side.

steps.title: Intuition
steps.content: Intuition Dogs are highly sensitive and intelligent animals who are aware of their surroundings; their nose is always on the ground with 1 ear perked up. Take your dream about a dog to listen as a sign to your gut and trust your instincts. It can be a sign to end a relationship that makes you feel uneasy, or to take a risk at your job to earn a much-needed promotion. In many cultures and religions, dogs are deeply connected with spirituality and the afterworld. Seeing a dog in your dream can also indicate that you’re developing your intuition and growing more connected to your higher self.

steps.title: A dream that a dog is chasing you can mean you’re running from stress.
steps.content: A dream that a dog is chasing you can mean you’re running from stress. An aggressive, unfriendly dog running after you might represent problems in your life and at work that are making you anxious. This dream can be a sign that instead of tackling them, you’re ignoring and repressing the issues which is making them worse. [4] X Research source Take this dream as a sign to gather your courage and face your problems head on . Write down what’s bothering you to put the issue into perspective and then brainstorm ways to solve it.

steps.title: Being attacked or bitten by a dog can mean someone will betray you.
steps.content: Being attacked or bitten by a dog can mean someone will betray you. Because dogs are loyal, loving creatures, dreaming about one lashing out at you can be a warning that a relationship you trusted is souring. A friend or coworker might not have your best interests at heart anymore and instead, be vying for your social standing or job. [5] X Research source When you have this dream, interpret it as a sign to be cautious and follow your intuition . If you get a bad feeling when hanging out with a friend or coworker, trust your gut and keep them at an arm’s distance away.

steps.title: Dreaming about an angry dog barking can signify you’re being negative.
steps.content: Dreaming about an angry dog barking can signify you’re being negative. Hearing a dog growl and bark is typically a warning sign that they’re not in a good mood, which can symbolize the negative emotions you’re feeling in real life. Your anger, frustration, or sadness might be putting strain on your relationships and yourself. [6] X Research source Use this dream to seek support from your loved ones and talk about your emotions. Being vulnerable is scary, but it helps you come to terms with how you’re feeling and take steps towards solving the issue that’s bringing you down. If the dog is barking but they’re friendly and affectionate, it can be a sign that a new friendship is in your future. A friendly dog barking can also be a message from your spirit guides that you are on the right path in life.

steps.title: A dream about sweet, playful puppies can indicate new opportunities.
steps.content: A dream about sweet, playful puppies can indicate new opportunities. Whether 1 puppy waddles into your dream or you’re surrounded by a whole litter, this is generally believed to be a positive omen. This might indicate that your dream job, an exciting move, or a new relationship is just around the corner. [7] X Research source A dream about a dog giving birth to puppies can be a sign that you’re ready to make your dreams a reality ; it’s time to create a plan to start your own business or spearhead a project at work.

steps.title: Seeing a dead dog in a dream can indicate positive change.
steps.content: Seeing a dead dog in a dream can indicate positive change. A dream about a dead dog might feel incredibly emotional and sad, which can reflect your own sadness about a relationship, job, or chapter ending in your life. However, this dream might be a sign that a door is opening to something better and you’re in for a wonderful transformation. [8] X Research source If you dream about your childhood dog or a companion you recently lost, this can be a spiritual sign that they are happy and okay in the afterlife.

steps.title: Dreaming that a dog is injured can mean you feel hurt.
steps.content: Dreaming that a dog is injured can mean you feel hurt. Seeing a sick or wounded pup in pain might symbolize your own vulnerabilities, whether you feel upset, abandoned, helpless, or betrayed by someone. This dream might be a way for you to process an argument you had with your partner or friend or deal with a draining work-load at your job. [9] X Research source When you’re feeling stressed and overwhelmed, make time to practice self-care . Take a refreshing walk outside, watch your favorite movie, or grab dinner with your friends.

steps.title: Playing with an affectionate dog can be a positive omen.
steps.content: Playing with an affectionate dog can be a positive omen. A dream about a friendly, furry pup might signify that your life is in harmony. This can be a sign that everything in your life, from your romantic relationships to your career, is balanced, fulfilling, and leaving you feeling content. [10] X Research source This dream can also remind you that you have loving, supportive relationships that build you up and help you grow.

steps.title: Dreaming about a dog guarding you can mean you want protection.
steps.content: Dreaming about a dog guarding you can mean you want protection. Watching a dog bare their teeth and protect you from harm might symbolize your desire for security. You might feel unstable in your life right now, whether you’re switching careers or coming out of a relationship. Or, a friend or partner might be going through a tough time and you want to shield them from being hurt. [11] X Research source Dealing with and accepting change can be difficult, so give yourself grace and allow yourself to feel your emotions about it. Then, cope with the change by talking to your friends and staying busy with a new hobby.

steps.title: A black dog can represent negative thoughts you’re repressing.
steps.content: A black dog can represent negative thoughts you’re repressing. In the world of dreams, black is generally believed to represent negativity and darkness. Seeing a black dog might mean that you’re pressing down negative feelings like anger, shame, sadness, and low self-worth instead of dealing with them. [12] X Research source Find the source of your repressed emotions to deal with your feelings . Keeping a journal or practicing relaxation techniques like medication can help you pinpoint what’s bothering you and make you feel better.

steps.title: White dogs in a dream might represent positivity and peace in your life.
steps.content: White dogs in a dream might represent positivity and peace in your life. White typically symbolizes harmony, purity, and innocence. Playing with a fluffy white dog in your dream can be a positive omen that joy and happiness are coming into your life. They might take the shape of a new friendship, deepening romantic relationship, or raise at work. [13] X Research source White dogs can also be a sign of spiritual protection and indicate that your spirit guides are with you to lead you away from negativity.

steps.title: A dream about a brown dog can signify being grounded.
steps.content: A dream about a brown dog can signify being grounded. Seeing a brown dog in your dream typically represents stability and staying down to earth. It can be a sign to listen to your instincts and think practically when making a big decision, like accepting a new job or entering into a new relationship. [14] X Research source A brown dog can also represent happiness and contentment in your relationships and signify that they’ll continue to run smoothly.

steps.title: In the Bible, dogs represent faith, loyalty, and protection.
steps.content: In the Bible, dogs represent faith, loyalty, and protection. According to Christian beliefs, dogs are devoted and obedient to their owners, protecting them against any harm that comes their way. Dreaming of a dog can be a sign that you are protected by God and that your faith is leading you down the right path.

steps.title: In Hinduism, dogs symbolize trust and transformation.
steps.content: In Hinduism, dogs symbolize trust and transformation. Dogs are typically viewed as loyal, loving animals according to Hindu beliefs; seeing one in your dream can indicate that you are surrounded by people who love and support you. [15] X Research source They can also be a bad omen or a sign of change and transformation. This stems from myths about Yama, the god of death, who had 2 dogs that guarded the land of the dead. [16] X Research source

steps.title: In Islam, dogs are considered signs of betrayal and deception.
steps.content: In Islam, dogs are considered signs of betrayal and deception. Generally, seeing a dog in your dreams is considered negative according to Islamic beliefs. This can be a warning that people around you are trying to take advantage of you or do you harm. [17] X Research source If the dog in the dream was happy and friendly, it can instead be a positive omen indicating good health and prosperity.

steps.title: In Chinese tradition, dogs signify financial misfortune.
steps.content: In Chinese tradition, dogs signify financial misfortune. Dogs are believed to be negative symbols in your dreams according to Chinese culture and beliefs. These dreams can be a sign that you will lose money in the future, so you should save your money instead of spending it. [18] X Research source

steps.title: Dogs are just one of many animals with spiritual meanings.
steps.content: Dogs are just one of many animals with spiritual meanings. There are tons of animal and insect-related dreams that carry deep symbolism and significance. These include: Cat dreams : Symbolizes intuition, femininity, an independent spirit, vulnerability, power, bad luck, and/or deceitfulness. Tiger dreams : Signifies strength, passion, independence, and spiritual growth. May also indicate fear, insecurity, and future challenges. Monkey dreams : Represents playfulness, innocence, primal instincts, mindfulness, and spiritual growth. Bear dreams : Indicates strength, wisdom, and support. Being attacked in the dream may mean you’re avoiding something in real life. Rat dreams: Symbolizes stress, fear, or a negative omen. Dreaming of a rat chasing you may mean you’re feeling overwhelmed. Skunk dreams : Signifies a desire to stand up for yourself or think before you act. They may also mean you’re feeling defensive or isolated. Bat dreams : Represents intuition, stress, anxiety, transformation, repressed thoughts, uncertainty, and/or femininity. Fish dreams : Signals fertility, pregnancy, or new opportunities. They also represent abundance, prosperity, and holiness. Shark dreams : May signal strength or danger. Dreaming of fighting a shark is a sign to face your problems head on. Wasp dreams : Signifies resilience, hard work, confrontation, insecurity, aggression, and impending danger. Scorpion dreams : Represents transformation, fear, danger, hidden emotions, sexuality, and/or protection.
